content.question: Which of the following accurately describes a similarity between the parliamentary system of the United Kingdom and the presidential system of Mexico?

choices.label: Both systems have separate popular elections for the chief executive and for the national legislature.
Both systems have a cabinet that advises the chief executive.
Both systems combine the lawmaking and executive functions into a single branch.
Both systems have a chief executive that serves as head of state and head of government.

content.answer: Both systems have a cabinet that advises the chief executive.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Compare two or more course countries based on their political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
